WorkItem.Description:
Sigils doesn't appear in the list of ranged gear of the DK. It doesn't work either for the model DPSDK or for the model TankDK.
Â 
Thank you in advance for the correction.

Comments.Message: The issue is that the sigils are not being created with what either DK model considers to be "relevant stats."  To fix the issue, "stats" for the sigil effects should be created and then assigned as "relevant" to each of the DK models.

Ok... I have code that should be parsing more of the sigils.
I pulled 13 sigils off of wowhead, and have tests that work for 7 of them.  I don't even have tests for those missing 6 yet.  But it gets something more available for DPSDK and TankDK to get a better handle on those sigils. 

The ones I haven't written code for yet are the all the Increases damage of X ability(ies) by Y amount.  Haven't gotten around to figuring out how best to add that to the stats value that's being returned. 

I haven't written tests for the other 2 functions in SpecialEffects.cs yet, I was just getting some test code specifically for Sigils to get them integrated into the models.
Update: Got the rest of the sigils to have stat increases.  These BonusDamage values haven't been integrated into the DK models yet, but all the sigils should now be parsed properly.

fixed: Completed: At revision: 33928  
Should be able to parse at least all the sigils (13) on wowhead.  The regex statements could probably expanded to do more of the general heavy lifting for special effects in general, but I leave that for another defect/update.
